unnormalised: Hey guys! Pesticide usage is a real issue, especially in Punjab's fields. Remember that farmer suicide crisis in 2005 due to crop failure and debt? We need sustainable solutions, like maybe techniques from IARI. My grandfather in Kerala used neem oil; 23/07/2010, he said it was much better. What alternatives are our Kisan Vikas Kendras teaching nowadays? 10/10/2024 is almost here! Need real change by 17:00 hrs.
normalised: Hey guys! Pesticide usage is a real issue, especially in Punjab's fields. Remember that farmer suicide crisis in two thousand and five due to crop failure and debt? We need sustainable solutions, like maybe techniques from I A R I. My grandfather in Kerala used neem oil; twenty third July two thousand and ten, he said it was much better. What alternatives are our Kisan Vikas Kendras teaching nowadays? tenth October two thousand and twenty four is almost here! Need real change by seventeen hundred hours.
